docs.lead_paragraph: A deadly outbreak of Middle East Respiratory Syndrome (MERS) forced South Korea's central bank to cut interest rates on Thursday as authorities reported 14 new cases.

headline.main: South Korea Cuts Rates as MERS Clouds Outlook; 14 New Cases
headline.print_headline: South Korea Cuts Rates as MERS Clouds Outlook; 14 New Cases

docs.snippet: A deadly outbreak of Middle East Respiratory Syndrome (MERS) forced South Korea's central bank to cut interest rates on Thursday as authorities reported 14 new cases.

docs.lead_paragraph: A federal appellate court upheld some of the toughest provisions of a Texas law, putting more than a dozen abortion clinics at risk of permanently shutting.

headline.main: Court Upholds Texas Limits on Abortions
headline.print_headline: Court Upholds Texas’ Limits on Abortions

docs.abstract: Panel of United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit, New Orleans, upholds some of most stringent provisions of Texas abortion law, placing half of state's remaining abortion clinics at risk of permanently closing; less than dozen clinics would remain open in state; lawmakers say provisions are meant to improve safety; abortion providers and women's rights groups vow appeal to Supreme Court.
docs.snippet: A federal appellate court upheld some of the toughest provisions of a Texas law, putting more than a dozen abortion clinics at risk of permanently shutting.

byline.contributor: Manny Fernandez reported from Waco, and Erik Eckholm from New York. Richard Pérez-Peña contributed reporting from New York.
byline.original: By MANNY FERNANDEZ and ERIK ECKHOLM

docs.lead_paragraph: Whether selling skillets, cookbooks, lobster or hot dogs, David Venable, QVC’s top food pitchman, is a culinary tower of power. Especially when he does his happy dance.

headline.main: QVC’s David Venable: The Man Who Helps America Cook
headline.print_headline: The Man Who Helps America Cook

docs.abstract: David Venable, best-selling cookbook author and host of cooking show on QVC network, has mastered art of marketing culinary equipment and books to suburban, Middle America audience eager for connection; recipe for his summer squash fritters with garlic dipping sauce given.
docs.snippet: Whether selling skillets, cookbooks, lobster or hot dogs, David Venable, QVC’s top food pitchman, is a culinary tower of power. Especially when he does his happy dance.

docs.lead_paragraph: A U.S. appeals court on Tuesday upheld the main provisions of a restrictive Texas abortion law including one requiring clinics to have certain hospital-grade facilities, a regulatory hurdle critics said was designed to shut down abortion providers.

headline.main: U.S. Appeals Court Upholds Restrictive Texas Abortion Law
headline.print_headline: U.S. Appeals Court Upholds Restrictive Texas Abortion Law

docs.snippet: A U.S. appeals court on Tuesday upheld the main provisions of a restrictive Texas abortion law including one requiring clinics to have certain hospital-grade facilities, a regulatory hurdle critics said was designed to shut down abortion providers.

headline.main: Science Fails to See Benefits of Eating Placenta

docs.abstract: Though recommended for everything from pain reduction to preventing postpartum depression, researchers found no good evidence that the practice offered any health advantages.
docs.snippet: Though recommended for everything from pain reduction to preventing postpartum depression, researchers found no good evidence that the practice offered any health advantages.

docs.lead_paragraph: When Gerry and Gay Edwards watched the joy sparked by Ireland's vote to allow gay marriage last month, they did not see the same country that had forced them abroad to end a doomed pregnancy 14 years ago.

headline.main: After Gay Marriage, Impatient Ireland Moves Debate Onto Abortion
headline.print_headline: After Gay Marriage, Impatient Ireland Moves Debate Onto Abortion

docs.snippet: When Gerry and Gay Edwards watched the joy sparked by Ireland's vote to allow gay marriage last month, they did not see the same country that had forced them abroad to end a doomed pregnancy 14 years ago.

docs.lead_paragraph: Amnesty International urged Ireland to ease its abortion ban as it unveiled a report Tuesday that said Europe's most restrictive laws on terminations endanger the lives of women.

headline.main: Amnesty: Ireland Should End Abortion Ban, Puts Women at Risk
headline.print_headline: Amnesty: Ireland Should End Abortion Ban, Puts Women at Risk

docs.snippet: Amnesty International urged Ireland to ease its abortion ban as it unveiled a report Tuesday that said Europe's most restrictive laws on terminations endanger the lives of women.

docs.abstract: Does Gawker's vote show that there's more hope for labor organization?
docs.snippet: Does Gawker's vote show that there's more hope for labor organization?

docs.lead_paragraph: Advocates on both sides of the abortion debate said Tuesday that they are stunned police arrested a Georgia woman on murder charges after a hospital social worker told officers she terminated her pregnancy by taking abortion pills.

headline.main: Ga. Woman Jailed on Murder Charge After Taking Abortion Pill
headline.print_headline: Ga. Woman Jailed on Murder Charge After Taking Abortion Pill

docs.snippet: Advocates on both sides of the abortion debate said Tuesday that they are stunned police arrested a Georgia woman on murder charges after a hospital social worker told officers she terminated her pregnancy by taking abortion pills.

docs.lead_paragraph: A new study suggests that receiving an IUD right after a cesarean delivery can help reduce unintended pregnancies and risks like prematurity.

headline.main: With New Study, New Mothers Seeking IUDs Are No Longer Urged to Wait
headline.print_headline: With New Study, New Mothers Seeking IUDs Are No Longer Urged to Wait

docs.abstract: Study published in journal Obstetrics and Gynecology suggests that doctors should give women who desire contraception, like intrauterine device, at time they deliver baby; study found that practice is far more effective at preventing unintended pregnancies and reducing number of babies conceived within 18 months after previous birth than simply telling new mothers to return six weeks after birth for contraception.
docs.snippet: A new study suggests that receiving an IUD right after a cesarean delivery can help reduce unintended pregnancies and risks like prematurity.
